questions.question: When steady state reaches in the tank then?

answers.a: The output velocity is always a constant
answers.b: The input velocity is always a constant
answers.c: The height of the fluid in the tank remains constant

questions.question: An arrangement as in your experiment is at steady state, what will happen if you increase the output flow rate?

answers.a: 1The fluid level in tank decreases continuously
answers.b: The fluid level in tank decreases and then becomes constant
answers.c: The fluid level in tank increases continuously
answers.d: The fluid level in tank increases and then becomes constant
